cycling

Class CyclingPortalImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cycling.CyclingPortalImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CyclingPortal, MiniCyclingPortal, java.io.Serializable

    public class CyclingPortalImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CyclingPortal
    This class is the implementation of the CyclingPortal interface. It is the only backend class that the frontend application can interact with.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    730003140, 730002704
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • viewRaceDetails

        public java.lang.String viewRaceDetails(int raceId)
                                 throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the details from a race. The state of this MiniCyclingPortal must be unchanged if any exceptions are thrown.
        Specified by:
        viewRaceDetails in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A string describing the race including: name, description,stage count, and total length
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.

      • addStageToRace

        public int addStageToRace(int raceId,
                          java.lang.String stageName,
                          java.lang.String description,
                          double length,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime startTime,
                          StageType type)
                   throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                          IllegalNameException,
                          InvalidNameException,
                          InvalidLengthException
        Creates a new stage and adds it to the race.
        Specified by:
        addStageToRace in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The race which the stage will be added to.
        stageName - An identifier name for the stage.
        description - A descriptive text for the stage.
        length - Stage length in kilometres.
        startTime - The date and time in which the stage will be raced. It cannot be null.
        type - The type of the stage. This is used to determine the amount of points given to the winner.
        Returns:
        the unique ID of the stage.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any race in the system.
        IllegalNameException - If the name already exists in the platform.
        InvalidNameException - If the name is null, empty, has more than 30 characters, or has white spaces.
        InvalidLengthException - If the length is less than 5km.

      • addCategorizedClimbToStage

        public int addCategorizedClimbToStage(int stageId,
                                      java.lang.Double location,
                                      CheckpointType type,
                                      java.lang.Double averageGradient,
                                      java.lang.Double length)
                               throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                      InvalidLocationException,
                                      InvalidStageStateException,
                                      InvalidStageTypeException
        Add a categorized climb to a stage.
        Specified by:
        addCategorizedClimbToStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage to which the climb checkpoint is being added.
        location - The kilometre location where the climb finishes within the stage.
        type - The category of the climb - CheckpointType.C4, CheckpointType.C3, CheckpointType.C2, CheckpointType.C1, or CheckpointType.HC.
        averageGradient - The average gradient for the climb.
        length - The length of the climb in kilometre.
        Returns:
        The ID of the newly created checkpoint
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any stage in the system.
        InvalidLocationException - If the location is out of bounds of the stage length.
        InvalidStageStateException - If the stage is "waiting for results".
        InvalidStageTypeException - Time-trial stages cannot contain any checkpoint.

      • addIntermediateSprintToStage

        public int addIntermediateSprintToStage(int stageId,
                                        double location)
                                 throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                        InvalidLocationException,
                                        InvalidStageStateException,
                                        InvalidStageTypeException
        Add an intermediate sprint to a stage.
        Specified by:
        addIntermediateSprintToStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage to which the intermediate sprint checkpoint is being added.
        location - The kilometre location where the intermediate sprint finishes within the stage.
        Returns:
        the Id of the newly created checkpoint
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any stage in the system.
        InvalidLocationException - If the location is out of bounds of the stage length.
        InvalidStageStateException - If the stage is "waiting for results".
        InvalidStageTypeException - Time-trial stages cannot contain any checkpoint.

        public int createRider(int teamId,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       int yearOfBirth)
                throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                       java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Create a rider and add them to a team.
        Specified by:
        createRider in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:

        name - The name of the rider.
        yearOfBirth - The year of birth of the rider.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • registerRiderResultsInStage

        public void registerRiderResultsInStage(int stageId,
                                        int riderId,
                                        java.time.LocalTime... checkpoints)
                                 throws IDNotRecognisedException,
                                        DuplicatedResultException,
                                        InvalidCheckpointTimesException,
                                        InvalidStageStateException
        Record the times of a rider in a stage.
        Specified by:
        registerRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
        riderId - The ID of the rider.
        checkpoints - An array of times at which the rider reached each of the checkpoints of the stage, including the start time and the finish line.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.
        DuplicatedResultException - Thrown if the rider has already a result for the stage. Each rider can have only one result per stage.
        InvalidCheckpointTimesException - Thrown if the length of checkpointTimes is not equal to n+2, where n is the number of checkpoints in the stage; +2 represents the start time and the finish time of the stage.
        InvalidStageStateException - Thrown if the stage is not "waiting for results". Results can only be added to a stage while it is "waiting for results".

      • getRiderResultsInStage

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getRiderResultsInStage(int stageId,
                                                    int riderId)
                                             throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the times of a rider in a stage.
        Specified by:
        getRiderResultsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage the result refers to.
        riderId - The ID of the rider.
        Returns:
        The array of times at which the rider reached each of the checkpoints of the stage and the total elapsed time. Or empty array if the rider has no result for the stage.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match to any rider or stage in the system.

        riderId - The ID of the rider.

        Throws:

      • getRidersRankInStage

        public int[] getRidersRankInStage(int stageId)
                           throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the riders (as IDs) that are a part of the queried stage ordered by their GC time.
        Specified by:
        getRidersRankInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The IDs of the riders sorted by elapsed time
        Throws:

      • getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage(int stageId)
                                                           throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the adjusted elapsed times of riders in a stage.
        Specified by:
        getRankedAdjustedElapsedTimesInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of adjusted elapsed times sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These times should match the riders returned by getRidersRankInStage(int)
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • getRidersPointsInStage

        public int[] getRidersPointsInStage(int stageId)
                             throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the number of points obtained by each rider in a stage.
        Specified by:
        getRidersPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of points each rider received in the stage, sorted by their elapsed time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by getRidersRankInStage(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointsInStage

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInStage(int stageId)
                                     throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the number of mountain points obtained by each rider in a stage.
        Specified by:
        getRidersMountainPointsInStage in interface MiniCyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        stageId - The ID of the stage being queried.
        Returns:
        The ranked list of mountain points each rider received in the stage, sorted by their finish time. An empty list if there is no result for the stage. These points should match the riders returned by getRidersRankInStage(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any stage in the system.

      • removeRaceByName

        public void removeRaceByName(java.lang.String name)
                      throws NameNotRecognisedException
        Removes a race by its name instead of by its ID.
        Specified by:
        removeRaceByName in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:

        Throws:

      • getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace

        public java.time.LocalTime[] getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace(int raceId)
                                                          throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the general classification times of riders in a race.
        Specified by:
        getGeneralClassificationTimesInRace in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A list of riders' times sorted by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race. These times should match the riders returned by getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersPointsInRace

        public int[] getRidersPointsInRace(int raceId)
                            throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the overall points of riders in a race.
        Specified by:
        getRidersPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        An array of riders' points (i.e., the sum of their points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total adjusted elapsed time. An empty array if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointsInRace

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointsInRace(int raceId)
                                    throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the overall mountain points of riders in a race.
        Specified by:
        getRidersMountainPointsInRace in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        An array of riders' mountain points (i.e., the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race), sorted by the total adjusted elapsed time. An empty array if there is no result for any stage in the race. These points should match the riders returned by getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int).
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersGeneralClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersGeneralClassificationRank(int raceId)
                                         throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the general classification rank of riders in a race.
        Specified by:
        getRidersGeneralClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted ascending by the sum of their adjusted elapsed times in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (least time). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersPointClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersPointClassificationRank(int raceId)
                                       throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the ranked list of riders based on the points classification in a race.
        Specified by:
        getRidersPointClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their points in all stages of the race. That is, the first in this list is the winner (more points). An empty list if there is no result for any stage in the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.

      • getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank

        public int[] getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank(int raceId)
                                               throws IDNotRecognisedException
        Get the ranked list of riders based on the mountain classification in a race.
        Specified by:
        getRidersMountainPointClassificationRank in interface CyclingPortal
        Parameters:
        raceId - The ID of the race being queried.
        Returns:
        A ranked list of riders' IDs sorted descending by the sum of their mountain points in all stages of the race.
        Throws:
        IDNotRecognisedException - If the ID does not match any race in the system.
